Summary: Very bright orange light that came and left during a laser light show. I have great pictures!
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching a laser light show at Darien lake amusement park on July 31 2010 when I noticed this bright orange glow in the sky. By the time I found my wife who had the camera the object disappeared . About five minutes l later it was back and we were able to get some really good pictures!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Darien
This sighting has never been favorited.
